manifest.name: Novel word count
manifest.description: Displays a word count (and more!) for each file, folder and vault in the File Explorer pane.
manifest.author: Isaac Lyman

data.manifestValue: Displays a word count (and more!) for each file, folder and vault in the File Explorer pane.
data.communityListValue: Display a word count, page count, creation date, or other statistics for each file, folder and vault in the File Explorer pane.
